00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemRenderer;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::ProblemRenderer - render a problem with a minimal
00023 amount of UI garbage.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00030 use WeBWorK::Utils::Tasks qw(renderProblems);
00031 
00032 sub pre_header_initialize {
00033     my ($self) = @_;
00034     my $r = $self->r;
00035     
00036     my $pg = $r->param('pg');
00037     my $file = $r->param('file');
00038     my $seed = $r->param('seed');
00039     my $mode = $r->param('mode');
00040     my $hint = $r->param('hint');
00041     my $sol = $r->param('sol');
00042     
00043     die "must specify either a PG problems (param 'pg') or a path to a PG file (param 'file') and not both"
00044         unless defined $pg and length $pg xor defined $file and length $file;
00045     
00046     my $problem = $self->get_problem($pg, $file);
00047     my @options = (r=>$r, problem_list=>[\$pg]);
00048     
00049     #push @options, (problem_seed=>$seed) if defined $seed;
00050     #push @options, (displayMode=>$mode) if defined $mode;
00051     #push @options, (showHints=>$hint) if defined $hint;
00052     #push @options, (showSolutions=>$sol) if defined $sol;
00053     
00054     ($self->{result}) = renderProblems(@options);
00055 }
00056 
00057 sub get_problem {
00058     my ($self, $pg, $file) = @_;
00059     
00060     if (defined $pg) {
00061         return \$pg;
00062     } else {
00063         return $file;
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 use Data::Dumper;
00068 sub content {
00069     my ($self) = @_;
00070     my $result = $self->{result};
00071     my $dump = Dumper($result);
00072     
00073     print <<EOF;
00074 <html>
00075 <head>
00076 <title>Yuck!</title>
00077 </head>
00078 <body>
00079 <pre>$dump</pre>
00080 </body>
00081 </html>
00082 EOF
00083 }
